name: animwebp
description: Convert a sequence of images to an animated WebP.
author: N. Escobar <nick@nescobar.media> (https://nickesc.github.io/)

scripts.docs:about: node --no-warnings scripts/generate_docs.js about | replace-between --target README.md --token ABOUT
scripts.docs:install: node --no-warnings scripts/generate_docs.js install | replace-between --target README.md --token INSTALL
scripts.docs:license: node --no-warnings scripts/generate_docs.js license | replace-between --target README.md --token LICENSE
scripts.docs: npm run docs:about && npm run docs:install && npm run docs:cli && npm run docs:reference && npm run docs:license
scripts.build:docs: npm run build && npm run docs
